name: macroecoai
description: MacroEconomics AI - Economic data visualization for Ethiopia

scripts.setup:local: npm run setup:db && npm run setup:kv
scripts.setup:db: echo 'Run: wrangler d1 create macroecoai-db-local' && echo 'Then update wrangler.toml with the database_id'
scripts.setup:kv: echo 'Run: wrangler kv:namespace create CACHE --preview' && echo 'Then update wrangler.toml with the id'
scripts.db:reset: wrangler d1 execute macroecoai-db-local --local --command='DROP TABLE IF EXISTS economic_indicators; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS news_articles; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS countries;' --env local && npm run db:init
scripts.test:scheduled: echo 'Manually trigger scheduled function from Cloudflare dashboard'

author: MacroAI Team
